00029 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 |   includes
00031 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00032 #include "Ap4Types.h"
00033 #include "Ap4ByteStream.h"
00034 
00035 #ifndef _AP4_FILE_BYTE_STREAM_H_
00036 #define _AP4_FILE_BYTE_STREAM_H_
00037 
00038 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 |   AP4_FileByteStream
00040 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00041 class AP4_FileByteStream: public AP4_ByteStream
00042 {
00043 public:
00044     // types
00045     typedef enum {
00046         STREAM_MODE_READ,
00047         STREAM_MODE_WRITE,
00048         STREAM_MODE_READ_WRITE
00049     } Mode;
00050 
00051     // methods
00052     AP4_FileByteStream(const char* name, Mode mode);
00053 
00054     // AP4_ByteStream methods
00055     AP4_Result ReadPartial(void*    buffer, 
00056                            AP4_Size  bytesToRead, 
00057                            AP4_Size& bytesRead) {
00058         return m_Delegate->ReadPartial(buffer, bytesToRead, bytesRead);
00059     }
00060     AP4_Result WritePartial(const void* buffer, 
00061                             AP4_Size    bytesToWrite, 
00062                             AP4_Size&   bytesWritten) {
00063         return m_Delegate->WritePartial(buffer, bytesToWrite, bytesWritten);
00064     }
00065     AP4_Result Seek(AP4_Position position)  { return m_Delegate->Seek(position); }
00066     AP4_Result Tell(AP4_Position& position) { return m_Delegate->Tell(position); }
00067     AP4_Result GetSize(AP4_LargeSize& size) { return m_Delegate->GetSize(size);  }
00068     AP4_Result Flush() { return m_Delegate->Flush(); }
00069 
00070     // AP4_Referenceable methods
00071     void AddReference() { m_Delegate->AddReference(); }
00072     void Release()      { m_Delegate->Release();      }
00073 
00074 protected:
00075     // methods
00076     virtual ~AP4_FileByteStream() {
00077         delete m_Delegate;
00078     }
00079 
00080     // members
00081     AP4_ByteStream* m_Delegate;
00082 };
00083 
00084 #endif // _AP4_FILE_BYTE_STREAM_H_
